item.title: Bernie Sanders Hails St. Charles Residents For Defeating Secretive 440-Acre Data Center: 'People Stand Up To Unfettered Corporate Greed'
item.description: Bernie Sanders praised St. Charles, Missouri residents for forcing developers to withdraw a secretive 440-acre data center plan. read more

item.title: Trump Jr-Backed Gun Financing Firm Cleared As Feds End Biden-Era Probe Over Political Bias
item.description: CFPB drops Biden-era probe into Credova Financial, citing improper political motivation. PublicSquare stock surges 20% after announcement. read more

item.title: Trump Admin To Turn Intel's CHIPS Act Grants Into Equity, Says Howard Lutnick: 'Why Are We Giving A Company Worth $100 Billion, This Kind of Money?'
item.description: Howard Lutnick said the Trump administration plans to convert federal funding pledged to Intel under the CHIPS Act into an equity stake. read more
